author: IronKern
install_msg: Thank you for installing AdaptiveAI! Use `/aiaddkey` to add your Mistral API keys (up to 8). Then set a free-room channel with `/aisetfreeroom` or just mention the bot to chat! made by BigFlush
name: AdaptiveAI
short: Adaptive AI chat bot that learns from server slang
description: An intelligent Discord bot powered by Mistral AI that learns from your server's conversation style and adapts its responses. Supports up to 8 API keys with automatic failover.
